clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of Infliximab (Remicade) to Treat Early Ankylosing Spondylitis
clinical_study.official_title: An Open Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Infliximab(Remicade) in Treating Patients With Early Ankylosing Spondylitis

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective open-label study to evaluated the efficacy and safety of infliximab(Remicade) in treating of patients with early ankylosing spondylitis (AS). Infliximab was injected intra-venous on baseline, 2nd week, 6th week, 12th week and 24th week, with dosing of 5mg/kg. The major outcome index is ASAS20, and minor outcome indexes include ASAS50 and ASAS70, BASDAI20,BASDAI50 and BASDAI70. And MRI of sacroiliac joint is not necessary. The adverse events at any time were recorded.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients achieving ASAS20 improvement.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients achieving ASAS50 and ASAS70

arm_group.description: 200mg infliximab inject intra-venous on baseline, 2nd week, 6th week, 12th week, 24th week

intervention.description: 100mg/bottle 5mg/kg inject intra-venous on baseline, 2nd week, 6th week, 12th week, 24th week
